name: Color Coded (Vawer, Sfregson)
description:
The color wheel says who moves! Spin it around and choose who will follow your movements to solve the various puzzles ahead. But beware, at least four different colors will always be selected simultaneously. There will also be spikes, color coded passages and slippery slopes blocking your path. I'm sure that is nothing that some color coordination can't solve!

Color Coded was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 unde the theme Joined Together.

Created by:

Gabriel "Vawer" da Motta (Art and Code)

Frederico "Sfregson" Guedes (Music)

The Font Digital Disco by jeti was used. (more info: https://fontenddev.com/fonts/digital-disco/)

The sound effect MixKit-Happy-Party-Horn-Sound-530 was used.

Made with Unity.

Music made with BeepBox.co.
